author: Juliegrace Brufke
title: GOP Rep calls for US to bring international case against China over coronavirus
description: Rep. Jim Banks (R-Ind.) is pushing for the State Department and Attorney General William Barr to launch an international case against China for the damages caused by the coronavirus pandemic.
